Method Detail

caDNAcopy

public DerivedDNAcopySegment caDNAcopy(DNAcopyAssays dnacopyAssays,
                                       DNAcopyParameter dnacopyParameter,
                                       org.bioconductor.packages.rservices.RServicesConnection connection)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
Java wrapper for R function caDNAcopy. Transform an object of object DNAcopyAssays-class in R package specifying copy number variation through smoothing and segmentation to a object DerivedDNAcopySegment-class in R package identifying chromosomal regions of constant copy number.

Parameters:
dnacopyAssays - Collection of object ExpressionData-class in R package objects representing samples from known chromosomal locations, and their expression values.
dnacopyParameter - An object of object DNAcopyParameter-class in R package encapsulating parameters influencing evaluation of caDNAcopy.}
Returns:
object DerivedDNAcopySegment-class in R package
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
